page.title: 14Woodham Ferrers old folk 3
page.content: They were very strict when I was at school and we did noit have as many holidays as you have. My parents were also very strict and we could not do just as we liked. My parents were good. We never went hungry and we went on a holiday every year so we were luckier than some were because my father worked for the government. When I was young I was not allowed to go swimming or dancing because I had heart trouble. I missed that. When I left school I became a dressmaker and had a three year apprenticeship. I enjoyed my life. People were very poor when I was young but they appeared to be satisfied and contented. Food was very cheap in those days. I think the world is going mad now. Even so I don not think there will ever be a nuclear war.I have lived through 2 world wars. The second was the worst with V bombs.
